title: Tuesday Pt1: Edge in Rams, Bills matchup; Trubisky named Steelers starter; Peter & Jamie's playoff teams
itunes:title: Tuesday Pt1: Edge in Rams, Bills matchup; Trubisky named Steelers starter; Peter & Jamie's playoff teams
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at which team should have the edge to win Thursday night, the Rams or Bills. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty share which storylines they’re most excited to watch for in Thursday’s game. Next, the GMFB panel reacts to Mitch Trubisky being named the starter in Pittsburgh and then PT-1 of the podcast finishes up with Peter Schrager and Jamie Erdahl listing their playoff teams.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
